Arranged by year

```{r, echo = FALSE, results='asis'}
# Load necessary libraries
library(scholar)
library(tibble)

# Define the id for Soeren Petersen
id <- 'prKV9NwAAAAJ' 

# Get publications from Google Scholar
publications <- scholar::get_publications(id) |> tibble::tibble() |> dplyr::arrange(desc(year))

# Start the table with a little padding between cells
cat("<table style='border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 10px;'>\n") # Add spacing between columns
cat("<tr><th>Title</th><th>Journal</th><th>Year</th><th>Citations</th></tr>\n")

# Loop through publications and generate table rows
for (i in 1:nrow(publications)) {
  title <- publications$title[i]
  journal <- publications$journal[i]
  year <- publications$year[i]
  cites <- publications$cites[i]
  pubid <- publications$pubid[i]
  
  # Create an HTML link for each publication and output a table row
  cat(paste0("<tr><td><a href='https://scholar.google.com/citations?view_op=view_citation&hl=en&user=", id, "&citation_for_view=", id, ":", pubid, "'>", title, "</a></td><td>", journal, "</td><td>", year, "</td><td style='padding-left: 20px;'>", cites, "</td></tr>\n"))
}

# End the table
cat("</table>\n")


```
